languages.text: "И... последнее на сегодня: несколько паломников с Футфола, милостиво принятых на борт, смущают умы команды рассказами о мире вознесенных. Говорят, молитвы на мире подле холодной звезды Цинерус Малефикум не стихали несколько сотен лет. Говорят, сам Бог-Император избрал эту планету и вознес весь народ ее в свои чертоги". {n}Вигдис прокашливается скрежетом вокс-системы.{/n} "Дабы не отвлекать команду от насущного, мы пресекли распространение слухов. Но, быть может, вы решите посетить планету со столь необычной репутацией".

"And... the last item for today: a few pilgrims from Footfall who were graciously welcomed aboard have been filling the crew's minds with tales of a world of the ascended. They say that prayers on a world near the cold star Cinerus Maleficum have not ceased for several hundred years. They claim that the God-Emperor Himself chose this planet and raised all its people to His halls." {n}Vigdis coughs over the vox system's grinding.{/n} "We have suppressed these rumours to ensure that the crew are not distracted from their vital tasks. But perhaps you might decide to visit this planet, given its unusual reputation."

Говорят, молитвы на мире подле холодной звезды Цинерус Малефикум не стихали несколько сотен лет. "And... the last item for today: a few pilgrims from Footfall who were graciously welcomed aboard have been filling the crew's minds with tales of a world of the ascended. They say that prayers on a world near the cold star Cinerus Maleficum have not ceased for several hundred years. They claim that the God-Emperor Himself chose this planet and raised all its people to His halls." {n}Vigdis coughs over the vox system's grinding.{/n} "We have suppressed these rumours to ensure that the crew are not distracted from their vital tasks. But perhaps you might decide to visit this planet, given its unusual reputation."

languages.text: « Et pour finir... dernier ordre du jour : une poignée de pèlerins originaires de Castel et gracieusement accueillis à bord ont farci le crâne de l'équipage d'histoires évoquant un monde réservé aux élus. Ils prétendent que depuis plusieurs centaines d'années, des prières s'élèvent sans discontinuer d'une planète située à proximité de l'étoile éteinte Cinerus Maleficum. Selon eux, l'Empereur-Dieu lui-même aurait choisi cette planète et accueilli tous ses habitants dans Son auguste giron. » {n}Vous entendez Vigdis toussoter par-dessus les grincements du système-vox.{/n} « Nous avons fait taire ces rumeurs afin de veiller à ce que le personnel ne se laisse pas détourner de sa mission première, mais la réputation inhabituelle de cette planète vous incitera peut-être à aller voir sur place. »
languages.original_text: "And... the last item for today: a few pilgrims from Footfall who were graciously welcomed aboard have been filling the crew's minds with tales of a world of the ascended. They say that prayers on a world near the cold star Cinerus Maleficum have not ceased for several hundred years. They claim that the God-Emperor Himself chose this planet and raised all its people to His halls." {n}Vigdis coughs over the vox system's grinding.{/n} "We have suppressed these rumours to ensure that the crew are not distracted from their vital tasks. But perhaps you might decide to visit this planet, given its unusual reputation."

traits.locale_text: « Et pour finir... dernier ordre du jour : une poignée de pèlerins originaires de Castel et gracieusement accueillis à bord ont farci le crâne de l'équipage d'histoires évoquant un monde réservé aux élus. Ils prétendent que depuis plusieurs centaines d'années, des prières s'élèvent sans discontinuer d'une planète située à proximité de l'étoile éteinte Cinerus Maleficum. Selon eux, l'Empereur-Dieu lui-même aurait choisi cette planète et accueilli tous ses habitants dans Son auguste giron. » {n}Vous entendez Vigdis toussoter par-dessus les grincements du système-vox.{/n} « Nous avons fait taire ces rumeurs afin de veiller à ce que le personnel ne se laisse pas détourner de sa mission première, mais la réputation inhabituelle de cette planète vous incitera peut-être à aller voir sur place. »

languages.text: «Y... el último punto del día: unos peregrinos de Paso, admitidos generosamente a bordo, han estado llenando las cabezas de la tripulación con historias de un mundo de ascendidos. Dicen que las plegarias en un mundo junto a la estrella fría Cinerus Maleficum no han cesado en varios cientos de años. Afirman que el mismísimo Dios Emperador ha elegido este planeta y ha ascendido a todos sus habitantes a Sus salones». {n}Vigdis tose entre los chasquidos del sistema de voco.{/n} «Hemos suprimido estos rumores para no distraer a la tripulación de sus tareas vitales, pero, dada esta reputación, quizá le interese visitar el planeta».
languages.original_text: "And... the last item for today: a few pilgrims from Footfall who were graciously welcomed aboard have been filling the crew's minds with tales of a world of the ascended. They say that prayers on a world near the cold star Cinerus Maleficum have not ceased for several hundred years. They claim that the God-Emperor Himself chose this planet and raised all its people to His halls." {n}Vigdis coughs over the vox system's grinding.{/n} "We have suppressed these rumours to ensure that the crew are not distracted from their vital tasks. But perhaps you might decide to visit this planet, given its unusual reputation."

traits.locale_text: «Y... el último punto del día: unos peregrinos de Paso, admitidos generosamente a bordo, han estado llenando las cabezas de la tripulación con historias de un mundo de ascendidos. Dicen que las plegarias en un mundo junto a la estrella fría Cinerus Maleficum no han cesado en varios cientos de años. Afirman que el mismísimo Dios Emperador ha elegido este planeta y ha ascendido a todos sus habitantes a Sus salones». {n}Vigdis tose entre los chasquidos del sistema de voco.{/n} «Hemos suprimido estos rumores para no distraer a la tripulación de sus tareas vitales, pero, dada esta reputación, quizá le interese visitar el planeta».

languages.text: 「そして…今日の最後の話は、快く乗船を歓迎されたフットフォールからの数人の巡礼者たちが、クルーの心を昇天の惑星の話で満たしているということです。彼らが言うには、冷たき星サイネラス・マレフィカム付近の惑星では、数百年もの間、祈りが絶えることはないそうです。彼らは神帝陛下ご自身がこの惑星を選び、すべての人々を主の殿堂へと引き上げると言っています」{n}ヴィグディスが通信装置越しに咳き込む。{/n}「クルーの重要な業務が妨げられないように、この手の噂は抑制しています。ですが、この一風変わった評判の惑星を訪れてみてはいかがでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "And... the last item for today: a few pilgrims from Footfall who were graciously welcomed aboard have been filling the crew's minds with tales of a world of the ascended. They say that prayers on a world near the cold star Cinerus Maleficum have not ceased for several hundred years. They claim that the God-Emperor Himself chose this planet and raised all its people to His halls." {n}Vigdis coughs over the vox system's grinding.{/n} "We have suppressed these rumours to ensure that the crew are not distracted from their vital tasks. But perhaps you might decide to visit this planet, given its unusual reputation."

traits.locale_text: 「そして…今日の最後の話は、快く乗船を歓迎されたフットフォールからの数人の巡礼者たちが、クルーの心を昇天の惑星の話で満たしているということです。彼らが言うには、冷たき星サイネラス・マレフィカム付近の惑星では、数百年もの間、祈りが絶えることはないそうです。彼らは神帝陛下ご自身がこの惑星を選び、すべての人々を主の殿堂へと引き上げると言っています」{n}ヴィグディスが通信装置越しに咳き込む。{/n}「クルーの重要な業務が妨げられないように、この手の噂は抑制しています。ですが、この一風変わった評判の惑星を訪れてみてはいかがでしょうか」

languages.text: “还有……今天最后的报告：几位来自落脚港的朝圣者得到了船员们的热烈欢迎。那些朝圣者向船员们讲述了某个飞升世界的故事，根据他们所言，苍灰恶咒冷星附近的某个世界，在这几百年间一直都在向神皇祈祷，一刻都不曾停止。他们说神皇亲自选中了那颗行星，将行星上的所有人都带到了祂的圣殿。”{n}音阵系统的静电声中，响起了维格迪斯的咳嗽声。{/n}“我们已经遏制了这些谣言，确保船员会专心工作，不会被谣言分心。不过，考虑到这颗行星不同寻常的流言，说不定您认为有必要一探究竟。”
languages.original_text: "And... the last item for today: a few pilgrims from Footfall who were graciously welcomed aboard have been filling the crew's minds with tales of a world of the ascended. They say that prayers on a world near the cold star Cinerus Maleficum have not ceased for several hundred years. They claim that the God-Emperor Himself chose this planet and raised all its people to His halls." {n}Vigdis coughs over the vox system's grinding.{/n} "We have suppressed these rumours to ensure that the crew are not distracted from their vital tasks. But perhaps you might decide to visit this planet, given its unusual reputation."

traits.locale_text: “还有……今天最后的报告：几位来自落脚港的朝圣者得到了船员们的热烈欢迎。那些朝圣者向船员们讲述了某个飞升世界的故事，根据他们所言，苍灰恶咒冷星附近的某个世界，在这几百年间一直都在向神皇祈祷，一刻都不曾停止。他们说神皇亲自选中了那颗行星，将行星上的所有人都带到了祂的圣殿。”{n}音阵系统的静电声中，响起了维格迪斯的咳嗽声。{/n}“我们已经遏制了这些谣言，确保船员会专心工作，不会被谣言分心。不过，考虑到这颗行星不同寻常的流言，说不定您认为有必要一探究竟。”

languages.text: "Und ... der letzte Punkt für heute. Einige Pilger aus Footfall, die an Bord gnädig willkommen geheißen wurden, haben in den Köpfen der Crew Geschichten von einer Welt der Aufgestiegenen verankert. Sie sagen, dass die Gebete auf einer Welt unweit des kalten Sterns Cinerus Maleficum seit hunderten von Jahren nicht verstummt sind. Angeblich hat der Gottimperator Selbst diesen Planeten auserwählt und alle seine Bewohner in Seine Hallen gerufen." {n}Vigdis hustet über das Knistern des Vox-Systems hinweg.{/n} "Wir haben diese Gerüchte unterdrückt, um sicherzustellen, dass die Crew nicht von ihren wichtigen Aufgaben abgelenkt wird. Aber vielleicht entscheidet Ihr Euch ja, diesen Planeten angesichts seines ungewöhnlichen Rufs aufzusuchen."
languages.original_text: "And... the last item for today: a few pilgrims from Footfall who were graciously welcomed aboard have been filling the crew's minds with tales of a world of the ascended. They say that prayers on a world near the cold star Cinerus Maleficum have not ceased for several hundred years. They claim that the God-Emperor Himself chose this planet and raised all its people to His halls." {n}Vigdis coughs over the vox system's grinding.{/n} "We have suppressed these rumours to ensure that the crew are not distracted from their vital tasks. But perhaps you might decide to visit this planet, given its unusual reputation."

Einige Pilger aus Footfall, die an Bord gnädig willkommen geheißen wurden, haben in den Köpfen der Crew Geschichten von einer Welt der Aufgestiegenen verankert. Sie sagen, dass die Gebete auf einer Welt unweit des kalten Sterns Cinerus Maleficum seit hunderten von Jahren nicht verstummt sind. Angeblich hat der Gottimperator Selbst diesen Planeten auserwählt und alle seine Bewohner in Seine Hallen gerufen." {n}Vigdis hustet über das Knistern des Vox-Systems hinweg.{/n} "Wir haben diese Gerüchte unterdrückt, um sicherzustellen, dass die Crew nicht von ihren wichtigen Aufgaben abgelenkt wird. Aber vielleicht entscheidet Ihr Euch ja, diesen Planeten angesichts seines ungewöhnlichen Rufs aufzusuchen."

languages.text: "Gelelim bugünün son meselesine... Binliman'dan gelen ve gemide güzelce karşılanan birkaç hacı, seçilmişlere ayrılmış bir dünyaya dair hikâyelerle mürettebatın kafasını dolduruyor. Soğuk yıldız Cinerus Maleficum'un yakınlarındaki bu dünyada, birkaç yüzyıldır kesintisiz olarak dua edildiğini söylüyorlar. Tanrı İmparator Hazretleri'nin bizzat bu gezegeni seçtiğini ve tüm insanlarını O'nun salonlarına taşıdığını iddia ediyorlar." {n}Vigdis'in öksürüğü, voks sisteminin cızırtıları arasında duyuluyor.{/n} "Mürettebatın dikkatini hayati görevlerinde tutabilmesi adına bu söylentilere ket vurduk. Tabii alışılmadık itibarı da düşünüldüğünde dilerseniz bu gezegeni ziyaret etmeye karar verebilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "And... the last item for today: a few pilgrims from Footfall who were graciously welcomed aboard have been filling the crew's minds with tales of a world of the ascended. They say that prayers on a world near the cold star Cinerus Maleficum have not ceased for several hundred years. They claim that the God-Emperor Himself chose this planet and raised all its people to His halls." {n}Vigdis coughs over the vox system's grinding.{/n} "We have suppressed these rumours to ensure that the crew are not distracted from their vital tasks. But perhaps you might decide to visit this planet, given its unusual reputation."
